title: Bloomberg Markets: Moynihan on Harvey Relief, Buffett Stake
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Moynihan on Harvey Relief, Buffett Stake
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Brian T Moynihan\u0010Chairman/President/CEO\u0010Bank of America \u0010Discussing providing relief for customers impacted by Hurricane Harvey and Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway exercising warrants to buy 700 million shares of the bank. The interview is conducted by Erik Schatzker of Bloomberg News.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
